CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Yang and coworkers used selenophene to replace thiophene π-bridge in the indacenodithiophene (IDT)-benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD)-based copolymer ( PThBDDIDT ) to develop a donor-π-acceptor type copolymer , PSeBDDIDT.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| selenophene |
| thiophene |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD) |
| PThBDDIDT |
| PSeBDDIDT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| selenophene |
| thiophene |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD) |
| PThBDDIDT |
| PSeBDDIDT |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names: selenophene, thiophene, IDT, BDD, PThBDDIDT, and PSeBDDIDT.
